titleStmt.title: An apologie, or aunswer in defence of the Church of England concerninge the state of religion vsed in the same. Newly set forth in Latin, and nowe translated into Englishe.
Apologia Ecclesiae Anglicanae. English
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Jewel, John. Apologia Ecclesiæ Anglicanæ.
"Trans[lation]. said to have been supervised by Abp. M. Parker"--STC.
Running title reads: An apologie of the Churche of Englande.
Quires A and B are in two different settings. Folger also reports a copy lacking a colophon.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
